meta.subtitle: 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行。
meta.author: gislfzhao

pages.title: top
pages.text: AV.initialize("leancloud_appid", "leancloud_appkey"); let time = 0 let title = "" let url = "" let query = new AV.Query('Counter'); query.notEqualTo('id', 0); query.descending('time'); query.limit(1000); query.find().then(function (todo) { for (let i = 0; i < 1000; i++){ const result = todo[i].attributes; time = result.time; title = result.title; url = result.url; const content="【文章热度:"+time+"℃】"+title+""; document.getElementById("top").innerHTML += content } }, function (error) { console.log("error"); });

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Primary HeaderWelcome to Hexo! Info HeaderWelcome to Hexo! Success HeaderWelcome to Hexo! Warning HeaderWelcome to Hexo! Danger HeaderWelcome to Hexo! \begin{equation} e=mc^2 \end{equation}\label{eq1}The famous matter-energy equation $\eqref{eq1}$ proposed by Einstein…
